fade{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:.9}}div.row:nth-child(2)>div:nth-child(1){margin-top:0!important}.box.box-solid.bg-blue-gradient.text-center{border-top-color:#2d88bd!important}div,a,p,h1,h2,h3,h4,font,td,tr{font-family:'Fira Sans'!important}select{border-radius:3px 3px 3px 3px!important;border:0;box-shadow:0 1px 3px rgba(50,50,93,.15),0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.02);height:32px}.table-striped>tbody>tr:nth-of-type(2n+1){background-color:#fff}.table-hover>tbody>tr:hover{background-color:#fff}.datepicker table tr td span.focused,.datepicker table tr td span:hover{background-color:#2d88bd}pre,code,.ace_line{font-family:'Fira Code'!important}span[class="month focused"]{color:#000;background-color:#fdf59a!important}span[class="year focused"]{color:#000;background-color:#fdf59a!important}table[class="table-condensed"]{width:100%!important}td[class="day"]{background-color:#2d88bd;line-height:1.42857143!important;padding:5px 0!important}td[colspan="7"]{background-color:#2d88bd;line-height:1.42857143!important;padding:5px 0!important}td[class="old day"]{background-color:#2d88bd;line-height:1.42857143!important;padding:5px 0!important}td[class="new day"]{background-color:#2d88bd;line-height:1.42857143!important;padding:5px 0!important}td[class="today day"]{background-color:#2d88bd;line-height:1.42857143!important;padding:5px 0!important}td[class="active day"]{background-color:#1f72a2!important;line-height:1.42857143!important;padding:5px 0!important}.container-fluid>center:nth-child(9){display:none}div[style="min-heiht:80px"]{position:fixed;left:0;right:0}body>div>div.content-wrapper>section>div:nth-child(1)>div>div.box.box-danger{margin-top:60px}.b,strong{font-weight:500}table{border-collapse:unset}td[colspan="1"]{line-height:1.42857143!important}td{background-color:#fff;line-height:1.4!important;padding:18px 8px!important;font-size:17px}html,body{font-family:'Fira Sans'!important}code,.hljs{font-family:consolas,monospace,"Courier New"}::-webkit-scrollbar{width:6px;height:10px;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0)}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.05)}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.2)}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background-color:#3c8dbc}*::selection{background-color:#cce2ff}*::-moz-selection{background-color:#cce2ff}*::-webkit-selection{background-color:#cce2ff}.box-info{width:80%;margin-left:10%;padding:30px
